amendment.description: Amendment sought to add provisions which clarify that section 5 of the bill was intended to supplement and not supersede the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section that this Act shall not be intended to supercede, or limit the provisions of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 242 (Roll no. 767).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 242 (Roll no. 767).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Rush.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
